snippet.title: Trine 4 – Modus Indie Access #2 | Making the Music
snippet.description:
Go behind the scenes with Trine series composer Ari Pulkkinen. Pre-order Trine 4 now: https://www.trine4.com/?utm_campaign=devdiary2&utm_source=modus&utm_medium=youtube&utm_content=description#store

Composer and music producer Ari Pulkkinen discusses how his hobby of sound design led to a professional career at Frozenbyte as the developer’s in-house music and audio director, and how the music of the Trine series has evolved over the last 10 years.

Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince returns to its roots in 2.5D this fall, boasting significantly more gameplay than its predecessors. Alongside Trine 4, Modus Games will release Trine: Ultimate Collection, the best way to experience the entire Trine series: Trine Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power, and Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince.

Pre-order now: https://modus.games/2XFnT60
Find us on Steam: https://modus.games/2XipeeK
Like on Facebook: https://modus.games/facebook
Follow on Twitter: https://modus.games/twitter
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
